text: Hugo Romeo Guerra Cabrera (25 February 1966 – 11 May 2018) was a Uruguayan football player. He was born in Canelones, Uruguay. Guerra played for Gimnasia y Esgrima La Plata, Huracán, Boca Juniors and Ferro Carril Oeste in the Primera División de Argentina. Guerra died from cardiac arrest on 11 May 2018 at the age of 52.Hugo Guerra, del fútbol al automovilismo == References == Category:1966 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest
title: Hugo Guerra
